meanings.definition: A long essay on a particular subject, especially one written for a university degree or diploma.
meanings.sent1: Her dissertation on marine life was filled with colorful pictures and interesting facts.
meanings.sent2: She spent months researching and writing her dissertation on ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent3: The professor joked that his dissertation on gardening could make anyone a green thumb expert.
meanings.sent4: His dissertation on the human mind was a deep dive into the complexities of thought.
meanings.sent5: The dissertation on space exploration painted a vivid picture of the unknown universe.

meanings.sent1: She will dissertation about the impact of technology on society for her final project.
meanings.sent2: Students often dissertation about topics they are passionate about.
meanings.sent3: He decided to dissertation on the history of music, surprising everyone with his choice.
meanings.sent4: The author will dissertation on the importance of storytelling in culture.
meanings.sent5: They plan to dissertation on environmental issues to raise awareness.
